titles.title: Stop Crystal Meth Act of 2005
Stop Crystal Meth Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to treat drug offenses involving crystal meth similarly to drug offenses involving crack cocaine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Stop Crystal Meth Act of 2005 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to lower the threshold quantities of mixtures or substances containing a detectable amount of methamphetamine to which penalties for controlled substances violations apply.
